channel.title: Dead not being revealed
channel.description:
#### What happened? I exed a player as prince but we didn't see there role reveal until after the game was over. A couple other players who died also didn't get revealed properly as they died. There name appeared as if they were alive but were unselectable for votes/abilties. Game took place around 11: 40-11:54 us central time on 3/29/19
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? there role should be revealed upon death and other such indications that they are dead.
#### Steps to reproduce: since this is a death reveal issue not sure how I can reproduce this other than play more.
#### Comments: The main issue was not knowing the factions of several dead players and not knowing how many unseen/evil roles were left.
